title: Thanks whoever implemented typing Marksman to get all the adcs

replies.body:
You can do this? In champ select I can type "Support" for supports? Awesome!!

Upvote for awareness.

Fun fact: You can use the same shortcuts from champ select and the item store in the new toolbar we have on the Community Beta. For example: when you are picking a champ icon, you can type "marksman" and get the ADCs here too!
One thing I did notice was that in the Item Sets tab, you can type in acronyms like "bt", "botrk", "ie", etc and get the items they're for. That's pretty clever.
It's been a think that was around for a long time but got removed accidentally for about the span of a patch.
